title: Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program for Healthcare Workforce Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational methodologies and subject-matter knowledge in mathematics
context.additional_context: Program to enhance educational design capabilities for pre-service/in-service teachers, incorporating realistic constraints of healthcare workforce training systems

learning_goals: Participants can design and implement three or more modern teaching methods applicable in medical education settings.
Participants can establish an effective educational material development plan in resource-constrained environments.
Participants can derive curriculum improvement plans through collaboration with peer teachers.
Participants can build a digital tool-based educational assessment system in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
